publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-4560 Kenneth Gibson: Arran Outdoor and Walking Festival—That the Parliament welcomes the 2009 Arran Outdoor and Walking Festival, which takes place from 18 to 21 September, and the contribution that it will make to Scotland’s flourishing tourism trade; marvels at the hard work put in by volunteer outdoor enthusiasts to ensure that the festival operates smoothly; commends the festival for raising the profile of Arran on a national and international stage; recognises the importance of such festivals in highlighting Scotland’s natural aesthetic beauty, and wishes the organisers every success this year and in years to come. Supported by: Shirley-Anne Somerville, Aileen Campbell, John Lamont, Rob Gibson, Bill Wilson, Ross Finnie, Jamie McGrigor, John Wilson, Bill Kidd, Anne McLaughlin, Stuart McMillan*, Alasdair Allan*
